title: How to turn on screenshots - Quora

response.answer_text: It all depends which device you are on if you are using an Apple tablet or phone you simply just press the home button and the power off button at the same time, for iPhone X, iPad 2018, and newer models, simply just click the power off button and the lower volume button. To screenshot on a Mac press SHIFT + CMD + 4 for a cropped screenshot(you will be able to pick out the dimensions of this screenshot), press SHIFT + CMD + 3 to take a full screenshot. To take a screenshot on Windows 10, just press the Windows key and the print key on the top right. To take a screenshot on android hold the power button and volume down button and wait for the screen to momentarily flash. Other devices have other features for taking screenshots such as simply waving your hand across the screen or even just speaking to the phone.
